decision:
Integrate CapabilityChecker into the ICGL pipeline in api/server.py:

Before executing run_analysis_task, add capability checking logic:

1. Import CapabilityChecker from backend.agents.capability_checker
2. In run_analysis_task function, after extracting the idea text:
   - Check if idea mentions creating a new agent (contains 'agent', 'create', etc.)
   - If yes, extract proposed capabilities from idea text
   - Call checker.suggest_agent_creation(proposed_capabilities)
   - Add check_result to the analysis metadata
   - If recommendation is ENHANCE_EXISTING, add warning to analysis
3. Return capability_check in the response so UI can display it

This ensures CapabilityChecker runs automatically before agent creation.

full_context:
Integrate CapabilityChecker into the ICGL pipeline in api/server.py:

Before executing run_analysis_task, add capability checking logic:

1. Import CapabilityChecker from backend.agents.capability_checker
2. In run_analysis_task function, after extracting the idea text:
   - Check if idea mentions creating a new agent (contains 'agent', 'create', etc.)
   - If yes, extract proposed capabilities from idea text
   - Call checker.suggest_agent_creation(proposed_capabilities)
   - Add check_result to the analysis metadata
   - If recommendation is ENHANCE_EXISTING, add warning to analysis
3. Return capability_check in the response so UI can display it

This ensures CapabilityChecker runs automatically before agent creation.
